[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/handlers/mail_track.c

This handler keeps track of who has a mailer at the moment and sends the mail to there instead. This also keeps track of the current mailing lists in the system.

Written by Pinkfish

Started 1991 sometime

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes std/object.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/mail_track.h, /include/player_handler.h and /include/mail.h

mail
int mail(string str,
string sub)
This is the main mail function. It tries to start up a mailer with the default address and subject. If their is no default address then the mailer uses it's menu mode, otherwise it sends one mail and then leaves.

Parameters:
str - 0 or "" for no default address
sub - the default subject
